name: part_003
file: tmp_【３DLive】晴れ時々にわかミオ【 #大神ミオ生誕ライブ2024 】 [VzecQUmB1sY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio and Omaru Polka perform the song 'Mela!' on stage.
Stage transition and intro for the next performance.
Ookami Mio, Inugami Korone, and Tsunomaki Watame perform the song 'Joyful' (じょいふる).

subtitles.original: 信じてばかりの僕と
subtitles.english: Just me who only keeps believing,

subtitles.original: 信じることが怖い君と
subtitles.english: And you who are afraid to believe,

subtitles.original: どちらが正しいのかなんて
subtitles.english: As for which of us is correct,

subtitles.original: 誰にも分からない
subtitles.english: No one can tell.

subtitles.original: Lalala...
subtitles.english: Lalala...

subtitles.original: 僕らだけの世界に
subtitles.english: In a world that belongs only to us,

subtitles.original: Lalala...
subtitles.english: Lalala...

subtitles.original: ギブとテイクさ
subtitles.english: It's give and take.

subtitles.original: Lalala...
subtitles.english: Lalala...

subtitles.original: 補い合えた暁には
subtitles.english: When we finally complement each other,

subtitles.original: 同じ夢を見たい
subtitles.english: I want to see the same dream.

subtitles.original: 君はかっこいいと苦しめて
subtitles.english: I say you're cool, and it hurts you,

subtitles.original: ひとりぼっちにさせたのは
subtitles.english: And what made you feel all alone

subtitles.original: 少し僕のせいなんだよな ごめんね
subtitles.english: Was partly my fault, I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: だけど見るべきはリアルだ
subtitles.english: But what you should see is reality,

subtitles.original: 今こそ僕が助けるんだ
subtitles.english: Now is the time for me to save you.

subtitles.original: 抱えないで信じて頼ってほしいんだ
subtitles.english: Don't hold it in; believe and rely on me.

subtitles.original: 今なんじゃない メラメラとたぎる
subtitles.english: Isn't now the time? Blazing and boiling,

subtitles.original: こんな僕にも潜む正義が
subtitles.english: The justice that hides even within me.

subtitles.original: どうしようもない衝動に駆られて
subtitles.english: Driven by an uncontrollable urge,

subtitles.original: ほら気付けば手を握っている
subtitles.english: Look, before I knew it, I was holding your hand.

subtitles.original: 放っておけない そんなに荷物を
subtitles.english: I can't leave you alone, carrying so much luggage,

subtitles.original: 背負い込んでどこへ行くの
subtitles.english: Where are you going with all that on your back?

subtitles.original: ほんのちょっと僕にちょっと預けてみては？
subtitles.english: How about letting me carry some of it for a bit?

subtitles.original: こんな僕も君のヒーローになりたいのさ
subtitles.english: Even someone like me wants to be your hero.

subtitles.original: キミノコエヲキカセテ
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voice!

subtitles.original: サアボウケンシテミナイ
subtitles.english: Come on, won't you go on an adventure?

subtitles.original: タノシイコトハジメヨウ
subtitles.english: Let's start something fun!

subtitles.original: 遊びたい！
subtitles.english: I want to play!

subtitles.original: ぜったい！
subtitles.english: Definitely!

subtitles.original: たい！たい！たい！たい！
subtitles.english: -ly! -ly! -ly! -ly!

subtitles.original: JOYとJOYとPOPなベイベー
subtitles.english: Joy and joy and pop baby!

subtitles.original: JOYとJOYとHAPPYなピーポー
subtitles.english: Joy and joy and happy people!

subtitles.original: ヨワムシナンカジャナイ
subtitles.english: I'm not a coward!

subtitles.original: ジシンアリゲニピースサイン
subtitles.english: A confident peace sign!

subtitles.original: キミノヒトミニキスシテ
subtitles.english: Kissing your eyes,

subtitles.original: 笑いたい！
subtitles.english: I want to laugh!

subtitles.original: ぜったい！
subtitles.english: Definitely!

subtitles.original: たい！たい！たい！たい！
subtitles.english: -ly! -ly! -ly! -ly!

subtitles.original: JOYとJOYとYOUきなベイベー
subtitles.english: Joy and joy and courageous baby!

subtitles.original: JOYとJOYとHAPPYなSayイエー
subtitles.english: Joy and joy and happy, say yeah!

subtitles.original: 君の心はそうもっと Do Do
subtitles.english: Your heart is, yeah, more do-do!

subtitles.original: 僕の心もそういっそ Good Good
subtitles.english: My heart is also, yeah, rather good-good!

subtitles.original: ハジケテンジャナイッツォジョイフル
subtitles.english: Aren't we bursting? More like, joyful!

subtitles.original: ぱぴぷぺぽぱぴぷぺぽ Yeah
subtitles.english: Pa-pi-pu-pe-po pa-pi-pu-pe-po yeah!

subtitles.original: JOYとJOYとPOPなベイベー
subtitles.english: Joy and joy and pop baby!

subtitles.original: JOYとJOYとHAPPYなピーポー
subtitles.english: Joy and joy and happy people!

subtitles.original: ドキドキしちゃうのナンデダロウ
subtitles.english: Why does my heart race?

subtitles.original: ズキズキしちゃうのナンデダロウ
subtitles.english: Why does it throb?

subtitles.original: この指にとまるのはどんな運命なんだ
subtitles.english: What kind of fate is it that lands on this finger?

subtitles.original: ぜんぶしたいな
subtitles.english: I want to do it all!

subtitles.original: じょいふるだって終わっちゃう
subtitles.english: Even Joyful will come to an end,

subtitles.original: エブリバディいつか終わっちゃう
subtitles.english: Everybody ends eventually,

subtitles.original: いつもこの時を
subtitles.english: Always this moment...

subtitles.original: 最終型はもっと修正なして
subtitles.english: The final form, without more correction,

subtitles.original: どー We Do We Do
subtitles.english: Do- We Do We Do

subtitles.original: どー We Do We Do
subtitles.english: Do- We Do We Do

subtitles.original: どー ぱぴぷぺぽ ぱぴぷぺぽ ぱぴぷぺぽ
subtitles.english: Do- pa-pi-pu-pe-po pa-pi-pu-pe-po...

subtitles.original: いたい！たい！たい！たい！
subtitles.english: Definitely! -ly! -ly! -ly!

subtitles.original: JOYとJOYとYOUきなベイベー
subtitles.english: Joy and joy and courageous baby!
